title: FS: Four T217 Mono prices reduced
author: edjs

posts.post_title: FS: Four T217 Mono prices reduced
posts.post_content:
Four T217 Mono Tobacco.  All prices are delivered, PP/FF. Email or PM if interested, thanks.

Bernard SGC A-$[STRIKE]350[/STRIKE]$300
Couchman SGC 3-$[STRIKE]700[/STRIKE]$625
Chadbourne, not graded-$[STRIKE]550[/STRIKE]$500
Knapp SGC A-$[STRIKE]275[/STRIKE]$240

Nice T217 Mono cards Ed.  I like how the Knapp card is actually a misspelling of the player's name...he was actually Gene Krapp.  

Here is how a sportswriter was thoughtfully able to work Krapp's name into an article, and get it past his editor, during his playing career (found this in Krapp's SABR writeup):

“Krapp squeezed his way out of a tight hole when, with the bases full, he induced Rollie Zeider to line to Bill Wambsganss for an inning-ending double play.”

Brian (good luck with the sales)
